title: Commissions and remittance options
content:
Our unique commission structure gives you the chance to earn twice: $0.20 per free (no payment info required!)
account sign-up and $20 per upgrade.
Each link on your site has a unique tracking code. When a customer clicks through from your site to
grammarly.com
and creates a free Grammarly account or upgrades to Grammarly Pro, we record that conversion and attribute it to your account.
You can view your conversions and current earnings at any time in the Reports section.
Grammarly’s Affiliate Program offers three payment types – check (US Residents only), bank wire, or direct deposit. Please note, non-US payments are available by bank wire only in USD. Please ensure your bank account accepts USD if you are outside the US. Grammarly does not make payments via PayPal.
